text.p: Electropharmacology Inc said Friday that it has been notified by the Nasdaq that its stock is to be delisted as of the close of business on July 24.
The company said the delisting is because of noncompliance with the minimum capital and surplus requirement.
The company said it is requesting a review of the staff's determination and a stay of delisting pending such review.
Electropharmacology develops medical applications of proprietary pulsed electromagnetic signals in the radio frequency range.
